attributes.action: TAKE THE TAG OFF JACK TWEEDY FOR THE REST OF JADE GOODY'S LIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEEEEEZE . 
She needs him now and for the next few months .....it needs to be off permanatly..whats he going to do......jade wants her fiance with her all the time she needs him....her face is beanming when shes with him ...surely for her sake and happiness grant her wish ....to jade it would be forever..woudnt it xxxxxxxx

rejection.details: Jack Straw has now made a decision on this case.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
